question: Match the plant growth hormones of Column-I with suitable chemical derivatives present in Column-II:

**Column-I**
(a) Abscisic acid
(b) Gibberellins
(c) Kinetin
(d) Auxin

**Column-II**
i. Adenine derivative
ii. Indole acetic acid
iii. Carotenoid derivative
iv. Terpenes
explanation: Abscisic acid = Carotenoid derivative (iii). Gibberellins = Terpenes (iv). Kinetin = Adenine derivative (i). Auxin = Indole compounds (ii). Match: a-iii, b-iv, c-i, d-ii.
